snippet: Speaking to Emory University students, Chipper Jones, the former Braves star, told his story of staying focused on his career goals, admitting when he was wrong and giving back.
abstract: Former Atlanta Braves third baseman Chipper Jones is a hit guest speaker at Emory University's Class Day; recalls for the graduating class how he targeted big league ballplayer as a career in his youth and maintained his focus to make it happen;  urges students to take their jobs seriously and, citing his charitable foundation, to give back to their communities.
lead_paragraph: Speaking to Emory University students, Chipper Jones, the former Braves star, told his story of staying focused on his career goals, admitting when he was wrong and giving back.

headline.seo: Chipper Jones Offers His Wisdom to Emory’s Seniors
headline.main: New Kind of Audience for Retired Braves Star
headline.print_headline: A New Kind of Audience For a Retired Braves Star
